website_summaries.verdict: An enzymatic cleaner that attacks and destroys bacteria to clean from the ground up.
pros: Nozzle delivers three types of spray: stream, foam, and mist, so you can customize your cleaning experience
cons: May not work quite as well on old stains as it does for odors

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I bought a house that was as is and one of the bedrooms sub floor was destroyed by pet stains. see the pics. I used 2 gallons of this stuff, rollered it on with a paint roller and let sit with windows open for 24hrs twice and the horrendous smell was GONE! I couldnt believe it. It even seemed to lighten up the stains. I was so relieved because I thought I was going to have to pull up those floors and have them replaced and I simply just did not have that in my budget. Thank you Simple Solution. :)
customer_reviews.author: Aquasue1

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver! Our adult cat was peeing on our bed and this got rid of the stain, the smell, and stopped her from doing it again!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... dog urine spots in our home office that were horribly smelly. I tried Nature's Miracle and opened all ...
customer_reviews.text: We had some dog urine spots in our home office that were horribly smelly. I tried Nature's Miracle and opened all the windows in that room for days, but the smell was still present. I finally bought this product and went around with the black light at night to find the spots - sprayed the spots and literally watched them disappear under the black light within seconds! The next morning, no spots and NO smell!! This will forever be my go-to brand, and as a veterinarian, I will recommend this to my clients for their pets!
customer_reviews.author: Kibo

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cats
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this for a few weeks around the cat box which also had a pad in front of it. Within a month the 2 cats that use this box lost all the hair on their back legs and one lost all the hair on his back too. They eat quality catfood and both have a separate diet so it was not the food. Sadly, one of the cat has developed cancerous tumors and will be put to sleep today. I am sure this spray contributed to this - they are entirely indoor cats and the other 2 cats that go outdoors/indoors are absolutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Try some other product
customer_reviews.text: First, the foaming feature does not work in mine..just sprays out like any spray bottle. Most importantly it does not work. I followed instructions to a “T” and I went through the whole routine 3 separate occasions and I can still smell the urine. The spot is no larger than a softball and when my moms dog was here I saw her starting to piddle inside so grabbed her and cleaned up immediately so it’s not as if a whole room was a problem. Also this was on an area rug that I was able to lift corners up for thourogh drying.
customer_reviews.author: bigdeal

customer_reviews.title: STAINED MY CARPET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this didn’t work for me since there are so many great reviews. I got the original in a gallon size. I followed all directions. Sprayed it on, soaking the carpet and underside. As the urine stain on visible under blacklight was old. Waited a couple hours for the enzyme to do its work and dry up. Now I have yellowish brown spots everywhere I sprayed which is all over my home!! My carpet is ruined. (See pictures)
customer_reviews.author: EsKimo

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping this product would work as well as promised. My dog peed and pooped in grandma's house (just great). I doused the areas with Simple Solution Extreme Stain and Odor remover and followed instructions. Neither the stain nor the smell were removed. So, back to the very effective product that costs nearly three time more. A classic example of, "You get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sery

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & removes odors, but leaky nozzle cap & didn't stop marking nearby zee it
customer_reviews.text: The springtime breeze scented spray has removed the odors, but only after applying at least twice. My cat is still peeing all over the couch in other spots though... I don't know what to do! I enjoyed the scent this left behind. A different brand (woolite) left a scent worse than the pee! Also, as others noted, the spray nozzle doesn't fit tightly and it will leak around your hand while you're spraying. Not a huge deal, but annoying. I let it lay on its side with the spray nozzle attached at one point and it made a big puddle, I lost a lot of product that way.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Gift for me with an old dog.
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yo springer spaniel can't seem to make it more that a foot from the back door before she MUST urinate (Ah the indignities of old age!).Given that this is happening every time that she needs to go, I had to do something to make this unfortunate situation tolerable. I tried several brands and have, without doubt, pledged all of my doggie mistakes to Simple Solution Extreme for life ( unless they change the formula!). Urine odor is not a part of my life even though the urine clearly is right outside the door. Thank you for allowing me not to hose down the patio every single time that my dear old girl needs to do her business!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product It does what it claims but I don’t think it fully removes the smell. I think it greatly reduced the smell and then masked the little amount left. It did remove the stain. Not the first go around though. I left it sit longer than the directions said. Overall left no signs unless you get on you hands and knees and sniff. In which case it only smells of the product. I probably wouldn’t use it on every accident. Probably more for carpet and extreme accidents. I would say it’s a great value and does work better then even more expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product after reading reviews. Bringing home a puppy in just a few weeks and wanted to be prepared for accidents. Had a few spots on my old rug from my current dog having a few potty accidents that I have never been able to get cleaned up completely and this stuff worked wonders!!! Spots gone instantly! I was even able to get an old mattress looking like new again (after YEARS of infant fosters.. (spit up, spilled late night bottles, you name it!) Didn’t mind the scent at all and would highly recommend for any stains... human or animal!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi S

customer_reviews.title: Different formula ? A bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I buy the spray bottle version of this A LOT so I went ahead and bought a big refil but this one smells awful. Every other simple solution I’ve purchased smelled great but this one seems to be bad. I can’t even put my finger on what the smell is, I just know it’s not a good one. I guess I’ll go back to the spray bottles. The extreme version is different in color than the regular one. Not entirely sure why that is though. Extreme is cloudy white and the regular is clear as water.
customer_reviews.author: Annabeth Hartford

customer_reviews.title: Effective cleaner, inoffensive scent, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning solution is great -- I've used it for several months and am happy with it's ease of use and cleaning ability. *However*, based on my good experience with this product, I ordered the large container intending to use it as a refill source for the spray bottle. NOT SO MUCH. The spray-trigger cap on the original bottle does not come off, rendering it useless as a refillable product. Beyond disappointed that the manufacturer didn't think about that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't used it yet but it smells REALLY strong like cat urine
customer_reviews.text: I received this and haven't used it yet but it smells REALLY strong like cat urine. I read where some say it has a pleasant odor??? Is it supposed to smell like this to deter them? My cats were all over the package and bottle sniffing it and looking like they were going to spray to mark the area. Could I have gotten a bad batch? I want it to get out the odor of a few areas my cats sprayed in my new apartment and to be a deterrent for future spraying. I don't have stains...yet. Will change my rating if this is indeed how it's supposed to smell and if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jo GTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend. It's not a citrus scent like others which ...
customer_reviews.text: Man I looked at sooo many of these. I had that Miracle stuff and it left an oily film on my rug. Gets the stain out and the big thing for me was odor. It works really really well on odor, highly recommend. It's not a citrus scent like others which to me is whatever, but this smell is fantastic. Its hard to explain, it makes my rug smell like a rug again haha. So it smells like a clean rug, sorta floral/clean linen if they had a baby. Hope this helps, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Optimus “Prime”

customer_reviews.title: Seems to remove cat urine odor from carpets.
customer_reviews.text: We recently returned from a trip, having left our two house cats for nearly three weeks. They were in the care of someone who dropped in once a day to be sure they were fed and litter boxes cleaned. Apparently, they considered they had been abandoned. To convey her feelings on the matter, one of them decided the most efficient means was to pee on the carpet just outside the litter box. The odor was quite strong. A deep spray of this odor and stain remover really knocked out the odor. I did not try to remove the stain, because the carpet is due for a regular deep cleaning, anyway, and will leave the stain removal for that deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: JoeInTampa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: My older dog has become incontinent and even though she wears a diaper, sometimes leakages happen. Anyway, I have been unable to keep up and we were thinking we would put her down, when I tried this Simple Solution. I put it in my small carpet cleaner and then just applied it with the applicator over almost the whole carpet and brushed it in with same. And left it. I came back about an hour and a half later and the carpet looked better than when I last had it done professionally! A couple of spots I will touch up tomorrow if they are still there. But I was amazed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: This product had great reviews. Maybe it doesn't work on mattresses? One of our pups peed on our mattress in the morning and apparently a while ago because that area was dried and set in. I used this spray on both (the newer hadn't even dried yet because I paid extra to have it delivered the same day) and it really didn't do much to either stain/spot. After following the directions on how to handle stubborn set in stains, it still did not do much to remove the older stain. These were very disappointing results and do not suggest this prodcut at all.
customer_reviews.author: PQuint160

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Have used this for many years, and as long as I have pets, I will not be without it!! Pets have accidents now and then, especially when they are young, and this is one of the best products ever! Natural enzymes eliminate odors from carpets and rugs and remove stains. Even for kitties, who until a new and higher litter pan came, who would miss the pan and pee over the side onto the wood trim..... how do you clean that!? Simple Solution.... it removes odor from wood, fabrics, rugs. An absolute must for pet owners!
customer_reviews.author: SusanManke

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat effective
customer_reviews.text: My feral one-year-old kitten frequently failed to use the litter box. I concluded that part of the problem was that she could still smell the scent of her previous misdeeds on the carpet, so she would again use that same spot. I then placed a plastic sheet in that area, and she'd still use that area instead of the litter box, and the plastic sheet then carried the familiar smell. Finally, I bought the Simple Solution product, and sprayed two squirts on the sheet every 8-12 hours. She sometimes still doesn't use the litter box, so I can only give a "somewhat satisfied" review.
customer_reviews.author: OnTheEdge

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs, if they have an accident I wipe up any moisture then spray this product over the area, cover with a dry rag for 24 hours and the stain is GONE. I follow up with a shampoo. The rag is used because otherwise you can't tell where the mess was. It's a miracle product if you have pets
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haws

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor of peroxide
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the bottle the odor was so overpowering I was afraid to use it in my home. It has a very strong smell of hydrogen peroxide. We did not even bother using the product so I can not comment on if it works or not. If you are sensitive to any strong smells, this cleaner isn't the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Scarcella

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This took out some older stains, and others it did not. It did work on a fresh potty accident on a throw rug, took the urine smell out. I find it a hit and miss with all of these products, so I guess this is about average, but it does take odors out better than others I've tried. Not sure I would buy it again because it didn't do anything spectacular that the other products didn't do.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this product, in fact I only bought it because it was on sale. But it turns out this product works great! We have a puppy so this is used a lot. We have white carpet and this takes away the yellow pee stains completely! Its super simple. We just spray and let it evaporate. Puppy doesnt go in the same place so it seems the smell is getting out. I will definitely buy this again if we run out. I highly recommend it. Better price and results than similar sprays from pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: In our opinion it's the best urine odor fighter made.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. It is the right consistency, is not overpowering in its smell but it does the job! We have a senior dog and he wears belly bands but sometimes we forget. We are in a rental apartment so we want to keep the smell away and this works! His urine is strong because of his medication so to have something that literally eats up the smell is wonderful. It's a little expensive but we stick with it because the less expensive ones just did not work as well. It's worth the difference. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness we found this product
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters senior dog had been incontinent for some time before he passed away and the smell was pretty bad. They have a cement slab and at first I thought we'd just clean it with Lysol, but fortunately I researched and found this. I called the company to get exact direction for using it on cement and then we did two applications spraying it on heavily with a garden sprayer and then leaving it . The odor is all gone and there is new carpet covering the cement with no issues. I appreciate the help and kindness I received from this company in getting directions
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken spray nozzle, but decent product
customer_reviews.text: It works okay, it did discourage my puppy from going on the carpet but did not 100% work, which of course is understandable because I have to continue to train him. But, my bottle came with a broken sprayer that leaked a lot. So, whenever I would spray it, about half would leak on to my hand. Would have given 4 stars if it had not been for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: a must have for all the pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product. We've used it with our dogs through a very stinky puppy phase, when there're lots of accidents of different bodily fluids that happen all around the house, especially on the carpeted floors. It works great, treats the odor and leaves the spots - well, spotless! I've even used it to spray and get the smell out of our retractable leashes (be sure to let the leash dry out completely before retracting it back), it works great! We use it in a spray bottle for spot treatments, and with a rented carpet steam cleaner. Works great in any scenario and smells great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Panchenko

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I initially bought it to clean up puppy urine based on the recommendation of a friend, but I use it all the time for other things now. We have little kids in our house so it is great for kid accidents (pee, vomit, spit up) as well as for the dog. A couple of weeks ago I cleaned out the car and used it to spot clean a couple of areas on the car upholstery. It didn't get out the grease spots in the cargo area, but everything on the seats was gone. And it doesn't have a harsh/strong chemical smell. I will always have a bottle of this stuff around!
customer_reviews.author: S. Chaston

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure About This Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product a lot with a new puppy in our home. I can't say that it is "completely effective," although it has been helpful. Our puppy STILL will return to the same area, even though we have used this product in that area repeatedly. No disrespect intended! We are just not 100% satisfied with it, however, we will use the remainder of all of the product we ordered. We will see what happens before we order again. We plan to check with out veterinarian, prior to purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonOne

customer_reviews.title: and noticed several days ago when sitting one smelled like urine. After spraying this liberally several times I ...
customer_reviews.text: Our small dog is potty trained but sometimes “dribbles” when he gets very excited. I purchased some attractive arm chairs, cloth, and noticed several days ago when sitting one smelled like urine. After spraying this liberally several times I detect absolutely no odor. Great to have on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Between potty training 2 toddlers and a stubborn male schnauzer who STILL likes to mark his territory after 10 years, I have cleaned up my fair share of urine. This product actually deodorizes the urine smell and after a couple of days, I usually can't smell the urine at all. The scent of the product itself reminds me of fabric softener but it too diminishes after just a few hours. I have recommended this to all of my mom friends who are potty training!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor & Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfumed Wet Dog is what I was left with.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading about several similar products. We purchased a used couch and once it was home, the overwhelming odor of wet dog was obvious. I purchased this and ended up using the entire bottle on the couch over 24 hours. All I ended up was perfumed wet dog :( very disappointing. Biting the bullet and having it scrubbed. If anyone else is reading reviews and using them as their guideline, I’d recommend finding another product. This was not a urine or feces smell, so I cannot speak for that odor. As for general “wet dog” it was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This pet cleaner works amazing. We just recently purchased a mini Goldendoodle puppy and like all new puppy's they occasionally have an accident in the house. So I bought this cleaner and I am so glad I did. This works amazing and the smell is great too. I bought other cleaners in the past and with multiple dogs they smell were the accident happened. With this cleaner, the dogs can't find where the accident occurred. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, aweful throw away squeeze bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and it does what it says it will do. The problem is with the bottle. When pressing the trigger, it takes squeezing about ten plus times before anything comes out. When it finally comes out it comes out everywhere, it runs down my arm and everywhere! To use properly I will have to find another bottle to put it in! Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Kbam

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing
customer_reviews.text: I have a young puppy who occasionally has accidents. I also am not a fan of my home smelling like dog urine. Prior to purchasing this, if my pup had an accident, I would spend a very long time cleaning it up. Combined with my handheld carpet shampooer, I have tried about 10 different products, none worked well. As a last resort before purchasing a much more expensive product, I chose this. I was amazed at how quickly and effectively this worked. I have since purchased a giant refill container because this is the only thing I will use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BridgetJames

customer_reviews.title: The wife says this stuff is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new puppy a few weeks ago and it's been raining nearly every day since, so it's been nearly impossible to train her to go outside. We've kept her in a spare bedroom and she's nice and comfy but the odor is really bad. My wife sprayed this stuff in the living room, where she sneaks around and pees, and you can't even smell the urine odor anymore. We're very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: The Viking

customer_reviews.title: Leaking all over the place! Can't even use it.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it smells nice, but it leaks like CRAZY. I can't even use it because it pours out of the side of the bottom of the lid no matter how many times I've tried to fix it. I can't even return it because it is leaking liquid everywhere and I can't ship that in the mail. I'm so disappointed, especially after seeing all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I have found to get accidents completely out of carpet, like it never even happened! I’ve also used it on other stains from juice or whatever the kids spill! It works like magic! The trick is to first soak up as much as the stain as you can with paper towels then pour this product on the stain, bigger than it originally was. Let it sit for about 10 minutes then blot up the excess with paper towels and let air dry. For bad stains repeat the process 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I recently cleaned my carpeting with a carpet cleaner that does a decent job on regular dirt, but pet stains just don't come out with regular cleaners. When I got done, the carpet looked pretty good except for about five urine stains from a dog that died over 12 years ago, so I was skeptical that this product would work well on stains that were that old. To my surprise, it worked very, very well. Light scent so hopefully it won't bother people who are "scent sensitive", and I certainly would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bedy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't eliminate the odor
customer_reviews.text: I caught my dog in the act of peeing on the carpet and was able to get it soaked and cleaned up while it was still bubbled up on the carpet. After I cleaned and dried it, I sprayed to eliminate the odor. I left it on for a day and it did nothing for the odor. I sprayed it heavily again and left it for 2 days and vacuumed and still, the urine order was strong and could be smelt from other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of experience when it comes to cleaning up after pet messes, i have probably spent thousands on several different products. I am rating this a 5 star because not only does it clean up the messes...it does seem to keep the new little one from returning....and, this is almost as important as that first part...it smells good! I cant stand when im cleaning a mess that obviously stinks and then the product i use stinks just as bad in a different way. This product does everything its supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: tviper311

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product through the entire puppy training fase. I have no stains on my carpets or oder and we have had so, so many accidents. I've been using this for 10 months and it's kept my pup from remarking the same spots. (Side note: yes, my pup is now potty trained) This product has been very well tested in my home. Works fantastic! I have the hard floor and carpet versions and love them!
customer_reviews.author: QuelFace

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. Pups have gone back and sniffed where it’s been used, so not sure if they still smell their scent or that of the spray, but we can’t smell anything. It even worked on a small spray on a bed’s satin dust ruffle, without leaving a ring. Time will tell if the residue causes the spit to attract dirt, which happens with some brands, but so far I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Price doubled! Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! They double the price! It was $15.81 now its $30 . I purchased this 2 weeks ago for $15. It works ok but it doesn't make your pets stop going potty in the area where this is used. Also there's another cleaner available that works better for $20 and its larger. Its a white bottle with yellow writing.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTeeLove

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I've used it on my light tan carpets for cleaning up dog puke, wife puke, dog pee, dog poop. I have to admit this might be the best spray cleaner I've used. Spray on, let it soak in, blot off. Then spray again and massage it into the carpet more. Blot again, or scrub out with a decent towel. Now a clean spot remains and the rest of the carpet looks dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maxon

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the smell
customer_reviews.text: The product was great, did what it was supposed to. One of our cats was peeing on the floor, not the litter box. Daily mopping with this stuff, while effective, was a pain. What I learned from the vet was that cats only pee on the floor if they are pissed off or if they have a urinary tract infection. The latter was the case. A “raging” infection, according to the vet. So, as good as this product is, there’s no substitute for getting the right health care for your pets. Just don’t tell our kitties I called them pets. They consider us as their staff.
customer_reviews.author: Engineering Geek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: I used this exactly as the instructions stated, but it didn't work one bit, might as well thrown down water on the carpet. It would've done a lot less damage and would not have left residue.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmac

customer_reviews.title: A must for pet messes!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! My dog started sneaking his way into a blocked off room and using a thick, plush white area rug as an indoor potty spot. My previous carpet cleaning solution would clean, but the smell just lingered, especially in the urine spot. So I tried this stuff and will not use anything else! I let this sit longer on old spots with the lingering smell, and it took it out! Clean fresh messes so easily and fantastically!
customer_reviews.author: Coliveri61

customer_reviews.title: Right now it would be the uncertanty of buying this product in the manner it was boxed.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the product but it comes highly recommended. Unfortunately, when I opened the box....there wasn't any padding for such a large container and the lid was partially cracked off. The only part that wasn't cracked off was exactly where the liquid pours out. It could have been a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Terry P

customer_reviews.title: Works for me on dog urine stains and the smell is nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another brand that was three times the price for the same size, THIS product worked, the other only marginally. Has a pleasant scent, kind of like toothpaste but it dissipates quickly. I have a puppy and to say he's obstinate would be an understatement. He knows not to go in the house but he doesn't really care. So this has been a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worked in my car
customer_reviews.text: Went to pick up a few cats in need of a home. One of them had an accident on the floor, under the seat. The car smelled pretty awful, as you can imagine. I sprayed some of this, and it decreased. The next day, I sprayed a ton more all over the area. It took a few days to go away, but no smell is left now. The effect wasn't immediate, but it did work. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of spray bottle; leaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: First time I got this, the spray mechanism was broken, and the bottle would leak when I sprayed. Second time, the spray was packaged separately, but when I assembled it, the bottle still leaked whenever I sprayed. Not very useful then, is it? Solution itself is okay. Not as good as the original formula Nature's Miracle. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Works absolutely perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had an amazing amount of trepidation ordering this as I have been burned before with similar products. I first brought it in a retail store at double the price. I have an older dog that often now has accidents on the rug. Once I noticed a urine stain I immediately stop it up with a cloth and then saturate it with simple solution extreme. Not only cleans the stain buddleia is behind a beautiful scent and also discourages a dog to further urinate in that area. The product works perfectly. I couldn't recommend it higher
customer_reviews.author: David B. Canale

customer_reviews.title: It did the job very well!
customer_reviews.text: We have a young Golden Retriever we adopted recently, at 7 months. She was supposed to be housebroken.. uh...nooo. Actually is a precious dog, but the giant puddles on the carpet after a night in because of extreme cold proved otherwise. Simple Solution Extreme Pet to the rescue! I did not think it was going to work but it did! And after a couple of days the spots have not reappeared, thank goodness. This was one of my better gambles !
customer_reviews.author: Sammie S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as describe
customer_reviews.text: Spray nozzle did not work and product leaked. I changed out the spray nozzle with one from another product. The smell of urine was still there while the product was wet. But once dried I was amazed I could not tell where the urine had been and there was no odor from the carpet. However, it has a strange smell on the furniture and I am not crazy about it for that purpose. Worked great on carpet not so much on furniture.
customer_reviews.author: acferran

customer_reviews.title: Took away the Smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly dog who is having a very hard time with making it outside all of the time. Not only did this take up the smell after only one use, but it has seemed to deter her from going into what was becoming her "preferred spot". Now she is at least trying to let us know more often. Not only that, but it completely lifted the smell out of my carpet which was SUCH a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was able to save a $700.00 mattress topper for a number mattress bed that a dog peed and vomited on. I sprayed it on let it sit for a day and vacumed it off. It smelled better then before.
customer_reviews.author: fun 7272

customer_reviews.title: I encountered simple solution as being a superior product according to many
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on urine in the carpet. As long as the accident is within a manageable size, this will work perfectly. The key is that the solution soaks through and dries well. If it doesn't dry well, I think the smell lingers. But that's something that affects all the solutions out there. I chose this over Nature's Miracle since they changes they formula. I felt that it wasn't working as well. Reading many reviews on the web, I encountered simple solution as being a superior product according to many. At least in my experience, I have nothing bad to say. It remove any odor or stain that would have remained without it.
customer_reviews.author: jbum

customer_reviews.title: Great for stains
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty good for pet stains of all kinds. If you spray the stain and walk away for a little bit the stain will lift and it does neutralize the smell. I do find that the top leaks sometimes and unscrews easily but it doesn't bother me and I have purchased this kind several times.
customer_reviews.author: 🌿 Fern 🌿

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: I did not think this would work I’ve tried everything when you have pets you need something good around so when there’s accidents To my surprise and great delight this worked beautifully. I could not believe I finally found something that I could use on everything. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Used 1X, no other accidents
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a 5 year old dog a few months back and was told he was "mostly" house-trained. I bought this as a pre-emptive crackdown on potential accidents. He had a single pee accident the first week home. I sprayed the area immediately and brought him over to it. Since then, he has had 0 accidents in my apartment. Not sure if this did the trick in that regard, but it certainly smelled nice and got the stain out of my rug!
customer_reviews.author: swims-the-mile

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product by the gallon for years and thought it worked pretty well. It also got out most stains. Then I got a black light and saw how much dog urine remained in the carpet after using it per instructions. Very, very disappointed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pet stain cleaner I’ve found!! It completely removes the pee smell and prevents a permanent stain on my carpet. And you don’t even have to scrub. Just spray and stamp with a towel and it’s clean and the enzymes in it keep working. I am on my third bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed in this product after reading all the positive reviews. It works well to remove stains from carpet and fabric but if you are trying to get the scent of urine out for get about this product because it just doesn't work for that. The scent of cat urine will remain. I followed all the instructions and applied it to fresh urine spots and it just did not work.
customer_reviews.author: mel15

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work initially but my cat contiued to pee ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work initially but my cat contiued to pee in the same location so it doesnt deter there scent. Careful with wood products or Trim because it wil warp the wood and bubble the paint. Make sure to remove any excess liquid from painted and wood surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one product I found that will take away cat vomit stains. I tried several other products and was extremely disappointed in all of them. We installed the "pet protect" carpet in our house, but no cleaner did the job. I felt like we wasted our money until we found this product. It even cleaned up the old stains that the other products couldn't remove!
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Marking
customer_reviews.text: I used the product together with a uv light to treat pet stains of my female on the area rug. It did a great job of removing these stains. Unfortunately, my older male dog continues to mark the corners of rooms - he is not discouraged at all by this product.
customer_reviews.author: hedgie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite enzyme cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the other major brand for years which was fine. Decided to switch because of a friend’s suggestion. So glad I did. The aroma is soooo much better than the other stuff. There is no dog urine smell leftover at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EMac69

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned dogs for over 40 years and I’ve tried virtually everything made for stain and odor removal. This is an excellent product and an even better price. It gets rid of the dog pee stain and smell like magic. I don’t know how it works on cat urine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a 5+++
customer_reviews.text: After trying many products on the market and living with two cats that find spraying my furniture for a hobby, I have found this cleaner really works. I spray it on and leave it for a while and then go over it with wet rag. It definitely takes the odor way and seem to harm my uphostelry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The dog had pooped on a rug and it was not solid. Usually when this happens I just throw out the rug because it's hard to get the smell out even after cleaning. This time I used the Extreme cleaner - I sprayed heavily multiple times letting it dry in between. After a couple of days the odor was gone and no stain.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Will not use anything else
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. I have had a multi-pet household for years and will not use anything else. Trick is as directions say, must satuarate area. You will have no stain and no odor. I have used on wood doors and multiple carpets including hand pulled wool with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my off white carpet steam cleaned. There were still a couple of spots, but not after I used this product. I do not have any dogs, but it is good for other spots. I also like the smell. THis product is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, until Amazon figured that out and raised the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Does well on types of stains and removes odors. The problem I have is with whoever decides to raise the cost. I bought this product 3 weeks ago for $6.87 and today went to purchase another bottle and the cost is $10.99!!! How can it jump 62% in 3 weeks? Whoa, that is just nonsense. I understand a slight increase, but that is high way robbery!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good smell, easy to pour, works in a variety of situations
customer_reviews.text: I really think that for the price, this can't be beat. I was looking for something to clean up the occasionally puppy accident -- and not long after purchasing it, our pup went potty on some of our bedding. The directions are clear, the scent is pleasant, and more importantly -- it works. After letting it soak (per the directions) and running through our normal wash cycle, there were no stains and no scent on the bedding. I also appreciate that it can work with a carpet cleaner for larger areas -- which I'm sure we will do at some point as well.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Fair results
customer_reviews.text: It was not as good as other products i have tried. I tried this on old urine stains and even on a fresh dog vomit and it did not really totally emiminate the stains. I like that it has no aggressive smell and easy to spray. The foamy kind of urine spray I found out works better in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Ok this works great! Our cat climbed into my sons truck one night and peed on the seat. We have tried absolutely everything to get rid of the smell for months now and could never get rid of it! I bought a huge bottle of this and dumped the whole thing all Over the cushion so that it went all the way through the seat we also scrubbed the floor with it just in case. The. We shop-vacced as much as we could of it out and let it air dry. It worked!!!!!! So very happy! PS: the smell is like baby powder, not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the odor of this it does combat any urine smell very well. I’m not sure how well it removes urine stains as I’ve really just been resting it on old stains that have yet to disappear. But the smell is nice for a cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these are useful and amazing and great. My only problem with it is that I had to spray the carpet area on three separate occasions to get rid of the smell. It would have been nice to only do it once and get it all over with.
customer_reviews.author: SPasciuti Reader Fox

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by cat hoarder
customer_reviews.text: Follow directions and Simple Solution Extreme Stain and Odor Remover does a great job in removing stains and odors from our myriad rescue cats. Also great for removing other organic stains from carpet, etc. Doesn't function to discourage repeat marking by our cats as well as I had hoped it would. We go through 12 or more gallons a year.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My cat, like most felines tends to upchuck every so often. The Simple Solution Extreme Stain + Odor Remover works exactly as advertised. Once you are ready to address the stain left by the vomit simply saturate it and some of the surrounding area - no scrubbing, no brushing, no water - ten to fifteen minutes later almost every stain I've treated has disappeared. Those that haven't were because I didn't saturate the area enough. Get a towel, put it over the area and with the heel of your foot grind on it a bit moving the towel to use dry areas of the towel - it's that simple.
customer_reviews.author: jim S

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Our puppy urinated in a floor air duct which we didn't find for days. I sprayed a large amount of this stuff in the duct and under the floor vent. This product failed to eliminate the awful odor, I ended up having to replace the entire duct and bleach the floor area. Should have used bleach instead of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: No sprayer is included.
customer_reviews.text: No sprayer is included, which would have been really nice since I do not have a smaller spray bottle to use. Also, the cap was broken when I received the package. It also tends to leak when I tilt the bottle to the side to shake the liquid out. Outside of that, it smells good and seems to remove the stains ok.
customer_reviews.author: T1245

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else worked....
customer_reviews.text: With a new puppies, accidents happen. We are have vinyl plank so I cant say for carpet or upholstery but for for hard flooring, this takes the smell completely away. Very satisfied, I had tried all household cleaners, but this works for its specific purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We've used this product with the first puppy and fortunately, he didn't have many accidents
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old pup and now another 3 month old. We've used this product with the first puppy and fortunately, he didn't have many accidents. However, this second one!!!! We have this spray bottle at the ready ALL the time as this new one has many accidents. The product is excellent at cleaning the area and eliminating the odor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JLR

customer_reviews.title: BEST STAIN & SMELL REMOVER
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!!!! I've tried so many other items on the market and non have worked as well as. I have two cats and one of my cats likes to pee out of the litter box from time to time. This stuff not only gets the stain out and the smell!!!!
customer_reviews.author: STACIE

customer_reviews.title: Works for cat urine
customer_reviews.text: It has a vaguely sweet smell that’s a bit annoying. But it’s so much better than cat urine, and once the carpet was treated with the Extreme Simple Solution, my cats seemed discouraged from returning to that spot. Also, people visiting could not detect the urine smell. I think it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Texanne

customer_reviews.title: A must for dog owners.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog or two, this is a must for those rear end issues. This is the only thing I've found to get that "fishy smell" out of the couch or carpet and it has a pleasant fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it REALLY works!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life! I've had dogs my entire life and had 2 dogs that would urinate in the house sometimes but could never get that nasty urine smell out. When my current bulldog who never urinates in the house urinated in my baby's room I realized I couldn't throw out the rug like I normally do (area rugs) and I had to try this based on the reviews. It REALLY works!!! I swear by it and have already told me friends and family. It's been over a month since I used it and the urine smell never came back!
customer_reviews.author: Jtatt

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with how it performs as well as the fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the product for 'dogs' not knowing there was a different product to use for 'cats'. After talking with their customer service representative, I learned that cat urine is much more difficult to eliminate. I'm pleased with how it performs as well as the fresh aroma it leaves behind until dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great scent (smells like baby powder) compared to Simple Solution's Triple Oxy spray (awful smell)
customer_reviews.text: Works very well so far. However, I've been using the Simple Solution Triple Oxy spray bottle, which actually has stronger cleaning power (spray on stains to clean) but gives an awful smell that takes awhile to go away. That was the one thing I couldn't find about the Simple Solution Extreme was what kind of scent it would give off. I went ahead and bought the gallon anyways since it's much cheaper than buying the smaller spray bottles every time. I am quite pleased with the SS Extreme's scent which smells like baby powder. Overall this was a great buy and I will continue buying the Extreme gallon refill.
customer_reviews.author: David Kha

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dog messes
customer_reviews.text: I foster dogs and most of them are not house-trained. I rely on top performing products to keep my house from smelling like urine and feces. I use this product on my laminate flooring, and for messes on rugs. Any rag and cleaner can wipe up a wet mess, but I can tell this product immediately starts to address the odors. By correctly cleaning a soiled spot, you are helping to ensure the dog wont come back to potty on the spot again. I've gone through many bottles, and will continue to purchase. The product does have an aroma, but it's a clean smelling aroma and not heavy or chemically.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I only selected one star because I had to, but this product is a waste of money. It absolutely did nothing except wet the furniture & made it smell good while it was wet. I woke up the next morning and the furniture was dry & still stinky with pet odors.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Spadea

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped my four month old Bernese learn to stop messing in his cage. One of the only things that worked! Helped get waste stains out of my off white carpet with my carpet cleaner as well. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: ph

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stain remover EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover EVER. Literally no comparison. My cat throws up on the REG and you would not be able to find one spot. I have full bottles of other stain removes that just didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: USELESS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for basic dog accidents on wood and carpet, followed the directions exactly. This product did nothing it claimed and did not deter dog whatsoever. I really needed this to work, especially for a weekend in a hotel. Disappointed that I wasted my money when there are so many other choices available.
customer_reviews.author: JGottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Works well, doesn't leave a bad odor or damage fabrics
customer_reviews.text: This solution works pretty well for cat urine. It has a pretty pleasant odor that doesn't linger forever and removes the stains/urine smell well. Not so well that the cat won't use the spot again without training, but it does the job of cleanup well enough for the area to come up clean with a black light and humans can no longer smell urine.
customer_reviews.author: Noxia

customer_reviews.title: Works!!! Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this. Cuts smell from puppy accidents fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Dogs starter urinating around the house as soon as I got pregnant. Not sure if they were acting out or what. But I purchased this to help with the accidents. Even with the spray and trying to stay on top of them they accidents continued. Didnt seem to work. It actually seemed to attract them.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Perez

product_meta.title: Simple Solution Extreme Pet Stain and Odor Remover | Enzymatic Cleaner with 3X Pro-Bacteria Cleaning Power
product_meta.description: Size:32 oz| Style:OriginalConfidently clean tough urine, feces, and vomit stains. Simple Solution Extreme Stain and Odor Remover is 3X stronger than our regular stain and odor remover, with a professional-strength Pro-Bacteria and enzyme formula that breaks down, neutralizes, and permanently removes stains and odors, while discouraging repeat “visits.” Worry-free use on carpet, upholstery, or other water-safe surfaces in your home. Safe around children and pets when used as directed. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Safe for use around pets and children

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
